doc:
Adrian Benjamin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrian_Benjamin 0 The Reverend Adrian Victor Benjamin (born 1942) is a prebendary emeritus of St. Paul's Cathedral (appointed in October 2007) and a former actor who has appeared with Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor.He is a graduate of Wadham College, Oxford (BA, 1966; MA, 1968). He was vicar of All Saint's Church, Friern Barnet from 1975 until 2012, and the religious editor for the ITV Oracle service since 1983.He played the Pope in the film Dr Faustus (1967).He was a contestant on The Search. The_Reverend_Adrian_Victor_Benjamin ( born 1942 ) is a_prebendary_emeritus of St._Paul 's_Cathedral ( appointed in October_2007 ) and a_former_actor who has_appeared with Richard_Burton and Elizabeth_Taylor.He is a_graduate of Wadham_College , Oxford ( BA , 1966 ; MA , 1968 ) . He was vicar of All_Saint 's_Church , Friern_Barnet from 1975 until 2012 , and the_religious_editor for the_ITV_Oracle_service since 1983 . He played the_Pope in the_film_Dr_Faustus_(_1967_) . He was a_contestant on The_Search .
